title: Photography
description: During my four years at IUT, I had the opportunity to explore my passion for photography. I actively participated in various photography contests, including BREAK THE CIRCLE by IUT Photographic Society, and was fortunate enough to receive recognition for my work. The experience not only honed my technical skills but also allowed me to develop my creative eye. I continue to enjoy photography as a hobby and cherish the memories I have captured through the lens.

title: Football
description: I participated in various football tournaments during my time at IUT. From local to inter-university tournaments, such as Inter year football tournament, WINGS Football Tournament, and Intra-department Football tournament, football provided me with an outlet to stay active and competitive. The sport taught me the value of teamwork, discipline, and perseverance. To this day, I still enjoy playing the sport and have fond memories of my time on the field.

title: Travelling
description: Travelling is something that I am truly passionate about. Over the years, I have been fortunate enough to explore various parts of Bangladesh, including Sajek, Bandorban, Sylhet, Saint Martin, Barisal, Kaptai, and Tanguar Haor. Each destination offered a unique experience and allowed me to appreciate the beauty of my country. Recently, I had the opportunity to travel to Maldives, and the experience was truly breathtaking. Travelling allows me to broaden my perspective, learn about different cultures, and create lasting memories.
